column1: #Text=The United Nations Human Rights Council has for the first time passed a proposal condemning discrimination against LGBT people .
#Text=The vote in Geneva passed 23 – 19 , with opposition coming from African and Islamic Arab nations .
#Text=Flag of the United Nations Image : Wilfried Huss / Anonymous .

#Text=proposed the resolution , which calls for a report on global discrimination based upon sexual orientation and announces " grave concern at acts of violence and discrimination , in all regions of the world , committed against individuals because of their sexual orientation and gender identity .

#Text= The Human Rights Council has taken a first bold step into territory previously considered off-limits , " said Graeme Reid , head of LGBT rights at Human Rights Watch .

column1: #Text=" Today ’s resolution breaks the silence that has been maintained for far too long , " said gay rights campaigners ARC International ' s John Fisher .

#Text=, US Secretary of State , also welcomed the resolution : " This represents a historic moment to highlight the human rights abuses and violations that lesbian , gay , bisexual , and transgender people face around the world based solely on who they are and whom they love .
